allow:
Bash(gh pr create --title "Add API docs scraper and tests for Tag methods" --body "$\(cat <<''EOF''
## Summary

- Add script to scrape Flickr API documentation and store examples locally
- Add tests for `Tag.getHotList`, `Tag.getListUser`, and `Tag.getListUserPopular` using scraped examples
- Fix bugs discovered while writing tests

## Changes

### API Documentation Scraper \(`scrape_api_docs.py`\)
- New script that fetches all API method documentation from Flickr website
- Saves method details \(description, arguments, example response, errors\) as JSON files in `api-docs/`
- Properly extracts XML examples from `<pre>` tags

### Tests \(`test/test_tags.py`\)
- Tests for three Tag API methods using example responses from api-docs
- Includes `xml_to_flickr_json\(\)` utility to convert XML examples to Flickr''s JSON format
- Validates correct parsing of API responses

### Bug Fixes \(`flickr_api/objects.py`\)
- **Tag.getListUser**: Changed from `Tag\(**t\)` to `Tag\(text=t\)` to handle string responses correctly \(matching `Person.getTags` behavior\)
- **Tag class**: Added missing `count` converter for `getListUserPopular`

## Test plan

- [x] Run `uv run --python 3.11 python3 -m unittest discover test/ -v` - all 13 tests pass
- [x] Verify scraper produces valid JSON with properly formatted XML

ðŸ¤– Generated with [Claude Code]\(https://claude.ai/code\)
EOF
\)")
Bash(~/.pyenv/versions/3.13.0/bin/python3 -m pip install requests oauth2 six)
Bash(~/.pyenv/versions/3.9.9/bin/python3 -m pip install requests oauth2 six)

Bash(git -C /Users/beaufour/repos/python-flickr-api commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Add tests for Group Membership/Pools and Interestingness API methods

- Add tests for flickr.groups.join, joinRequest, leave
- Add tests for flickr.groups.members.getList
- Add tests for flickr.groups.pools.add, getContext, getGroups, getPhotos, remove
- Add tests for flickr.interestingness.getList
- Fix bug in Group.getPoolContext: missing ** for nextphoto kwargs

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
Bash(GIT_SEQUENCE_EDITOR="sed -i '''' ''s/^pick \\\([a-f0-9]*\\\) fixup!/fixup \\1 fixup!/''" git rebase -i --autosquash HEAD~2)

Bash(git -C /Users/beaufour/repos/python-flickr-api commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Add type hints to objects.py domain classes

Add class-level type annotations for commonly-accessed attributes to main
domain classes \(Person, Photo, Photoset, Gallery, Group, Tag\) and type
the dict_converter helper function.

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
